name: NAL Is Alive
description: Over 130 games from nearly a decade and a half, brought together and upgraded in one cohesive package.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Processor: ~1.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible or integrated sound chip Additional Notes: Screen resolution minimum 960x540, recommended 1920x1080
